title: Theresa May – 2019 Statement to the Country on Brexit
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, made in Downing Street, London on 20 March 2019.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)

Nearly three years have passed since the public voted to leave the European Union.
